title: Solving the Non-profit Data Crisis
abstract: Observe. Orient. Decide. Act. Originally applied to combat operations, come learn how the OODA loop was strategically applied and combined with over 2 years of development, 3 Freedom of Information Act requests, multiple data vendors and a dedicated non-profit to drive change in the decision making processes and capabilities of the non-profit sector. Warrior Gateway was founded in 2009 with the simple mission of connecting our returning military and their families with local support organizations. What started out as a web portal has grown to become the largest information infrastructure platform available today for the military non-profit sector and state government agencies who support our veterans.
